strapiPost.title: Adventure Subaru Driving Local Education
strapiPost.content:
As part of the Subaru Loves Learning initiative, Adventure Subaru of Fayetteville adopted 25 classrooms at Owl Creek School, providing much-needed funding for teachers to purchase impactful supplies.

For the Kids: Throughout August, Adventure Subaru and over 630 participating Subaru retailers nationwide will support high-need schools by funding school supplies and resources. With Adventure Subaru's support, students in Fayetteville will have the tools and resources they need to succeed.

Around Town: Adventure Subaru won the Subaru of America's Retailer of the Year award in 2022 for its commitment to customers and the community. To date, the dealership has donated over $3.2m to 70+ charities in NWA.

Learn more about Subaru Loves Learning HERE.
